entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 February 2023
